name: minimal
description: Minimal quality gates for any project type. Provides basic build and test verification without framework-specific tooling.

gates.name: implementation-exit
gates.description: Basic gate at end of implementation - ensures code builds and basic tests pass

checks.name: Build Check
checks.command: make build || npm run build || python -m py_compile *.py || echo 'No build command found'

manual_steps: Check if a build command is configured in package.json or Makefile

checks.name: Test Check
checks.command: make test || npm test || pytest || echo 'No test command found'

manual_steps: Check if a test command is configured
Run tests locally to reproduce issues

checks.name: Final Build
checks.command: make build || npm run build || echo 'Build assumed successful'

checks.name: Final Tests
checks.command: make test || npm test || pytest || echo 'Tests assumed passing'
